name: Smartwool PhD Run Ultra Light Micro Socks - Women's
categories: PhD Run Ultra Light Micro Socks
description: Indestructawool technology with a run-specific fit. The high-density knit is super-durable and provides long lasting comfort.Made of merino wool, nylon and elastane with 4-degree fit for excellent recovery.Strategic mesh zones add moisture and temperature control.Seamless toe for comfort over varied terrain.Narrower profile is designed to fit women's feet.
